title: Sex Pistols Longhorn Ballroom nosebleed incident video clip(1978)

sources.title: Sex Pistols Longhorn Ballroom nosebleed incident video clip(1978)
sources.description: On January 10, 1978, the Sex Pistols were headlined to perform at the Longhorn Ballroom in Dallas, Texas. During the show, the band agitated the crowd and the crowd reacted back. The following video clip depicts a scene where Sid Vicious gets a beer can thrown at his nose.Â
